reviews.review: Серия игр любимых с детства, меньше читеров не стало, но перестать играть в эту игру это значит отпустить что то, что не хочешь отпускать...

Ну...
КС.....как КС...
Играть только со воими, и будет тебе удовольствие.
10 бесплатных кс с фулл тимой читеров из 10

beğenmediğim yönü hileye çok kolay bir şekilde ulaşabilmek. İnternette 10 dk araştirmayla hemen bulabiliyorsunuz ve bu çok sinir bozucu bizim gibi hile kullanmayan oyuncuları oyundan soğutuyor. İyi yönleri eğlenebiliyorsun cs işte abi sarıyooo.
it used to be best FPS game, but it fcking full of hack..........and you didn't even care. Fuck you !
If youre looking for a good way to rage and get easily mad, but still have fun and pleasure in this game it surely will satisfy your needs
Jogo muito bom, só que dps que deixaram free está tendo muitos hacks.
Читеров и так в каждой 3 игре, так еще и банят спустя месяца...
Le matchmaking de CS:GO est devenu déplorable depuis qu'il est devenu gratuit... Impossible de jouer en mode compétitif sans tomber sur des joueurs toxics (smurf, cheat, troll,...) et j'en passe !
It is a very good game I love it. Would play it every day
es un juego mui educatibo lol
i am terrorist killer. I shoot terrorist in head. Terrorist not dead because he cheat. I AM GET VERRY MAD! GRR
Ever since this game became free, it turned into trash.

Great game! There is no better way to learn Russian than playing CS:GO matchmaking.
